message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn!
I'll take a slightly larger share this time
Too greedy, Bob! I'm not giving up 70% of the pot that easily.
Meet me in the middle, Bob!

Alright, Bob, you've convinced me! Let's split it 48-52 and call it a day!
